title: 472. Sewing on the Go
description:
On today’s show, we’re talking about a fun solution that will let you enjoy the nice summer weather while also getting some sewing done! We’ll also be chatting about how to make a handwork sewing kit, simple ways to corral the mess on your work space, and a fun project a member of our staff is working on.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-472-sewing-on-the-go
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: Sewing on the Go
itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: Take your projects outdoors or on a road trip with these ideas.
